Foxtel has secured the rights to content that will live on HBO Max when it launches in America and in other parts of the world on May 27th. The service won’t make its way to Australia.

articles.author: Rachel Kaser
articles.title: Check out this Super Mario 64 PC port before Nintendo's lawyers pounce - The Next Web
articles.description: A fan has made a PC port of Super Mario 64 with 4K graphics. It's beautiful -- now let's see how long it lasts before Nintendo kills it.
articles.content:
A Mario fan has made a lovely, functional port of the Nintendo 64 classic for PC, with 4K graphics and ray-tracing, the whole enchilada. Everyone come take a look before Nintendos lawyers strip it clean like piranhas on a dead cow.
The video depicting the po… [+2281 chars]

articles.title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare's File Size Is Getting Ridiculous - GameSpot
articles.description: With another large update last week, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's file size is approaching half that of standard console hard drives.
articles.content: Since launch, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare has been steadily growing in size thanks to its frequent, large updates. Following last week's latest patch and additional DLC content, the Modern Warfare file size now occupies close to 200GB on any given platform, … [+2308 chars]
